name: CodeWorks Bootcamp
description: CodeWorks is a full stack JavaScript Bootcamp located in the heart of San Francisco that focuses on the technologies you need to get a high paying job as a web developer.

name: HackReactor Bootcamp
description: HackReactor has one goal, and that is to make you a rockstar developer and/or designer with a six figure salary. We teach both development and UI/UX.

name: ByteCamp
description: Is coding your passion? ByteCamp will give you the skills and the tools to become the best developer possible. We specialize in full stack web development and data science.

name: CodeHive Bootcamp
description: At CodeHive, we are passionate about teaching the latest and greatest web development technologies to help you become a successful developer. Our programs focus on front-end and back-end web development.
